meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Brad Rodriguez Alli Johnson Mike Hodel Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #5995.

td.p: Brad Rodriguez, an assistant general manager of a minor league baseball team from Jacksonville, Florida
Alli Johnson, a Ph.D. candidate and teaching assistant from Moreno Valley, California
Mike Hodel, a bartender from Bellingham, Washington (whose 1-day cash winnings total $2,100)

tr.td: SHAKESPEARE'S SETTINGS
HELLO, I'M JOHNNY CASH
BUILDING A RECIPE
MICHIGAN MANIA
THE COLOR OF MONEY
CROSSWORD CLUES "C"

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', '(Brad: What is Julius Caesar?)
(Alli: What is A Midsummer Night\'s Dream?)

Antony and Cleopatra

AlliBrad
Triple Stumper
')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'This play begins at a queen\'s palace in Alexandria')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: This play begins at a queen's palace in Alexandria

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_2_1', 'clue_J_2_1_stuck', '(Alli: What is "Ring Of Fire"?)
(Mike: What is "Walk The Line"?)
[Mike was initially ruled correct, but at the start of Double Jeopardy!, it was determined that he gave the name of the biographical film rather than the song title.]

"I Walk The Line"

MikeAlli
Triple Stumper
')

tr.td: Mike
Alli
Brad
BALLET
DEATH & CINEMA
NAME YOUR DISEASE
YOU SANK MY BATTLESHIP!
FRENCH CITIES?
FROM "A" TO "W"
(Alex: Each correct response will begin with an "A" and end with a "W.")

The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law.
